definition-item.definition-title: having means for ventilation or vapour discharge

Clean-rooms

section-body.paragraph-text: Classify in E04B9/02 only if the ceiling components themselves, e.g. the ceiling panels or the framework of the ceiling, have something special in relation to ventilation or vapour discharge.

A general ceiling having only openings for ventilation ducts and no other specific ventilation feature, should not be classified in E04B9/02. Conversely, a clean room ceiling having openings for ventilation ducts, the rest of the ceiling being air-tight, should be classified in E04B9/02, the air-tightness of the ceiling being a specific feature of the ceiling linked to the ventilation of the clean room.
